titleStmt.title: Wit in a constable A comedy written 1639. The author Henry Glapthorne. And now printed as it was lately acted at the Cock-pit in Drury lane, by their Majesties Servants, with good allowance.
titleStmt.author: Glapthorne, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Io. Okes, for F[rancis] C[onstable] and are to be sold at his shops in Kings-street at the signe of the Goat, and in Westminster Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the New York Public Library.
